sections.name: keywords: active directory; add ad group; ad; new accound; нов акаунт; онбординг; добавяне на нов служител
steps: Open the "IDM".
See if ID is available

Check for matching name in AD
  - If you find a match change the existing one by adding their job title to the name 
  - !!! If not changed, the new account will overwrite the old.
Approve in IDM.
In AD change SAM name to the ID and set email to 'dsk.grp'
Get model ID to get the AD groups and give them to the new user.
Add the groups to the new user.
Approve it in IDM

If the user is in Central Unit (0099)
  - Create Dimension account from IDM or DIM using model ID
  - Set passowrd for DIM

If the user is in Regions
  - Do NOT create DIM
Add the user to the DB for the correct location

Send email in Remedy:
  - User ID : 
  - User name:

sections.name: keywords: reset password; user account
steps: Open Active Directory Users and Computers (ADUC).
Search for the user.
Right-click the user account and select "Reset Password...".
Enter a new password and confirm.
Uncheck "User must change password at next logon"

sections.name: keywords: archimed; swift transactions; access to swift
steps: In Add AD group, assign APG Archimed.
In BankWay for JD, add DK5555

sections.name: keywords: mfa; account; password; error; login
steps: Verify the user account experiencing the MFA login error.
Reset MFA settings as required.
Test login to ensure the password and MFA work correctly.

sections.name: keywords: mail; permission; access denied; email
steps: Check the user's email permissions.
Add user to APG Mail group in Active Directory if necessary.
Verify the user can access email and Teams.

sections.name: keywords: crm; groups; crm access
steps: Verify user needs CRM access.
Add user to APG CRM Admin group in Active Directory.

procedures.name: Каса с кик / Главна каса / Замeстване на мениджър

sections.name: keywords: каса; главна; киб; заместване
steps: Change JD to PBRYNK6.

In BankWay:
  - AL to 50
  - AC to 9
  - Confirmation to Yes

procedures.name: Сбо Remote Overwrite with Swift Бисера

sections.name: keywords: сбo; remote; overwrite; swift; бисера
steps: Change JD to BRIBRK6

sections.name: keywords: clavis; оператор; swift; access to clavis
steps: Add user to APG CLAVIS Admin group in Active Directory

sections.name: keywords: vpn; access; required
steps: Advise the user to restart their VPN client.
Check the network connection.

sections.name: keywords: ssl; certificate; error
steps: Advise the user to clear their browser cache.
Retry the application.
Ensure the correct SSL certificate is installed if needed.

sections.name: keywords: wireless; wifi; office; access
steps: Add user to APG Wireless Admin group in Active Directory.
Confirm wireless access on office devices.

sections.name: keywords: account locked; user account; disabled
steps: Check if the account is locked in Active Directory or relevant system.
Unlock the account as needed.

sections.name: keywords: password reset; login; reset password; нова парола, парола за dimension; парола за bankway
steps: Advise user to reset their password in Active Directory.
Ensure the user can login after the reset.

sections.name: keywords: permission denied; access denied; rights; required access
steps: Verify the required system access.
Grant necessary permissions to the user.
Confirm user can access the requested system.

sections.name: keywords: general error; application error
steps: Advise user to restart the application.
